title: Paws in the Action
description:
Blackwood Cove is everything you would expect it to be.
Small, quaint, cozy... boring. For nineteen-year old Jasmine Moore, it's also home.As winter draws nearer and the days grow shorter, the town falls into its usual hibernation. No one expects much to happen until the tourist season starts again. And on most years, they would be right.The body of the local hermit is found one foggy morning, drowned and floating just off the beach. But his death is only the first in a string of bizarre occurrences that will change Jasmine's future as she takes up the mantle of detective, and the challenge of bringing peace back to a town that's never known anything else.Along with her canine companion, a golden retriever named Luffy with whom she shares an unusual bond, the young woman will dig through decades of forgotten histories and buried truths, confronting her own demons along the way.Paws In The Action will keep you guessing until the end. In the town of Blackwood Cove, anything can happen.Get it now.
author: Max Parrott
